data.name: Flairtender
data.detailed_description:
Flairtender is a virtual reality bartending game that has you mixing drinks with style! Start off small making a few simple cocktails, and in no time you'll be a master mixologist. Your drinks will be judged on speed, accuracy, and style, with better tips coming from better drinks! Use this cash to build up your bar and expand your repertoire. Create your own personal cocktails and submit them to be added to the official game!

Features
  • Free mode, for when you want to mess around
  • Practice mode to learn recipes at your own pace
  • Create custom drinks that are automatically added to your game
  • Tend mode to show off what you've learned
  • A variety of different glasses and over 30 liquids and garnishes to experiment with

data.short_description: Flairtender is a virtual reality bartending game that has you mixing drinks with style! Start off small making a few simple cocktails, and in no time you'll be a master mixologist.
data.reviews:
“This kind of a cool chill game I actually like it”
PewDiePie

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires tracked motion controllers for input
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires tracked motion controllers for input
